玄之又玄.definition: mystery within a mystery; the mysteries of the Dao according to Laozi 老子[Lao3 zi3]

玄參.definition: Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis); root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)

玄圃.definition: mythical fairyland on Kunlun Mountain 崑崙|昆仑[Kun1 lun2]

玄奘.definition: Xuanzang (602-664), Tang dynasty Buddhist monk and translator who traveled to India 629-645

玄奧.definition: abstruse; profound mystery; the mysteries of the universe

玄學.definition: Wei and Jin philosophical school amalgamating Daoist and Confucian ideals; translation of metaphysics (also translated 形而上學|形而上学)

玄幻.definition: xuanhuan, a fusion of Western and Eastern fantasy (subgenre of Chinese fantasy fiction)

玄機.definition: profound theory (in Daoism and Buddhism); mysterious principles

玄武.definition: Black Tortoise (the seven mansions of the north sky); (in Daoism) God of the north sky

玄武區.definition: Xuanwu (Black tortoise) district of Nanjing City 南京市 in Jiangsu 江蘇|江苏

玄武質熔岩.definition: basalt; also written 玄熔岩[xuan2 rong2 yan2]

玄武門之變.definition: Xuanwu gate coup of June 626 in early Tang, in which Li Shimin 李世民 killed his brothers, seized the throne from his father as Emperor Taizong 唐太宗

玄狐.definition: silver or black fox (Vulpes alopex argentatus)

玄理.definition: profound theory; philosophical theory of Wei and Jin 玄學|玄学 sect

玄秘.definition: mystery; mysterious; occult; abstruse doctrine (e.g. religious)

玄米茶.definition: genmaicha; Japanese tea with added roasted brown rice

玄色.definition: black (without gloss); black with a hint of red in it

玄菟郡.definition: Xuantu commandery (108 BC-c. 300 AD), one of four Han dynasty commanderies in north Korea
